DOC.brief_summary: It has been shown in laboratory studies that pomegranate juice contains anti-viral action against influenza. The researchers wish to investigate the effect of pomegranate juice on patients suffering from influenza A (seasonal or swine flu).
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of Fortified Pomegranate Juice (Punica Granatum) on Seasonal Influenza and Swine Flu Patients
DOC.criteria: Individuals confirmed and suffering from Influenza A Individuals suffering from influenza included in the high risk group
